channel.title: The Science Partnership. To educate, enlighten and entertain.
channel.description: Listen to our entertaining, informative (and occasionally controversial) Science Partnership podcasts. Enjoy regular spots like Pat On The Back, Crazy Science, In The Library and Brainy Hacks.
